DESCRIPTION: DOI number of an article. If there is no DOI number, put another available article identifier with proper annotation.
Copy here full content of the "Materials and Methods" section from the paper.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: Are the data in this paper environmental?
DESCRIPTION: Are the data in this paper eDNA data?

ATTRIBUTE NAME: Are the data available in paper or suplement?
DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the data is available in paper or in suplement. If it is available in another place - explaination where is it.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the sample collection method?
DESCRIPTION: Full description of the process of sample collection method.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the DNA extraction method?
DESCRIPTION: Full description of the process of DNA extraction method.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the source of the protocol in protocols.io?
DESCRIPTION: Reference to the source of the protocol. If there is no reference an explaination why is that and description of the protocol.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the overall sequencing strategy used in experiment?
DESCRIPTION: Description of the sequencing strategy in the paper.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the sequence analysis workflow?
DESCRIPTION: Full description of the sequencing analysis workflow detailing bioinformatic steps.
Link or explaination where is the data/metadata stored. If the data is splitted some way explaination how and links to every parts.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the marker name used in experiment?
DESCRIPTION: Name of the marker used for barcoding. If there are several, indicate each of them.

ATTRIBUTE NAME: What is the reference databse used for taxonomical identification?
DESCRIPTION: Full explaination about taxanomical identification: what is the reference database, an algorithm used, parameters, any curation methods.
